trans-unit.source: Switches into the given application domain, which the object should be bound to, and does a callback on the given function.
trans-unit.target: 切换到给定应用程序域中，应将对象绑定到，并在给定的函数回调。

trans-unit.source: AppDomainHelper is used internally by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: AppDomainHelper 由.NET Framework 在内部使用。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use the class directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: 不需要在代码中直接使用类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.AppDomainHelper"></xref> class.
Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 释放非托管的资源并执行其他清理操作之前<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>通过垃圾回收回收。

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法过程中将自动调用垃圾回收，除非已通过调用禁用垃圾回收器的终止<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> </xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清洗向上非托管资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
